name: Solitaire Deluxe 6-Pack HD
description:
Need to unwind? Relax with the time-tested best seller, Solitaire Deluxe 6-Pack. Now custom-designed for the iPad!

Enjoy classics like Klondike, Spider, and FreeCell, or use the in-depth tutorials to pick-up and play new favorites. Solitaire Deluxe® on iPad boasts a brand new user interface with beautiful animations, a sleek menu system, and cards that look so striking and crisp you can almost feel them!

FEATURES
6 games-in-1: Classic Solitaire(Klondike), FreeCell, Golf, Poker Solitaire, Scorpion, and Kings Corner
-Animated Tutorials for all games
-Exclusive Easy Read™ Cards
-Unlimited Undo

CUSTOMIZATION
-Landscape or portrait modes
-Left or right handed layouts
-Drag and drop option
-Easy-play Mode
-Auto Win

MORE SOLITAIRE GAMES
Add more games! Hand pick additional games a la carte, or get ALL of them for a low price. Choose from 10 terrific games: Spider, Tri-Peaks, Pyramid, Chinese Solitaire, Yukon, Canfield, Vanishing Cross, Spiderette, Russian Solitaire and The Harp.


FOLLOW MOBILE DELUXE™:
- twitter.com/mobiledeluxe
- facebook.com/solitairedeluxe

From Mobile Deluxe™, the makers of Solitaire Deluxe® 12-Pack and Solitaire Deluxe® 16-Pack. Now celebrating over 5,000,000 downloads!
